lines.text: Can you imagine coming home, and your wife says she's leaving you for someone else, and you say, "Who, Phil?" and she says, "No. Phyllis."
Well, that's the ultimate put-down... to those of us who are normal heterosexuals.

[Dumping two shot glasses of bourbon into his beer]
I, uh, once read where Harry Truman used to drink triple-bourbons for lunch. When I read that... I voted for him.
It's true what they say about Dobermans. I guess that's why they say it.
